title: List of all Android photo gallery  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android photo gallery  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: PhotoPicker
repoList.description: An android library to pick photo from gallery

repoList.name: PickPhotoSample
repoList.description: Photo Picker Of Android Library

repoList.name: ChiliPhotoPicker
repoList.description: Photo picker library for android. Let's you pick photos directly from files, or navigate to camera or gallery.

repoList.name: subsampling-scale-image-view
repoList.description: Android library (AAR). Highly configurable, easily extendable deep zoom view for displaying huge images without loss of detail. Perfect for photo galleries, maps, building plans etc.

repoList.name: AwCamera
repoList.description: Instagram-like photo browser

repoList.name: SaveImage
repoList.description: Cordova plugin allowing you to save an image file to the iOS Camera Roll / Photo Library or Android Gallery

repoList.name: ContentManager
repoList.description: Android library for getting photo or video from a device gallery, cloud or camera. Working with samsung devices. Made by Stfalcon

repoList.name: phototaker
repoList.description: :robot: Android library for handle about Take a Photo from camera :camera: or pick from gallery  :framed_picture:

repoList.name: medialibrary
repoList.description: This library is inspired with the Album structure of the Android Gallery and has abstracted library to get the Albums Data structure for Photos, Videos or All based on the Clustering of Photos based on Album, time, location, Tag, Size, etc.

repoList.name: AndroidMediaChooser
repoList.description: A library for choosing photos and videos from Android's device gallery.
